description: Number of composites between successive primes.
comments: n-th odd number of A028334(k). - _Giovanni Teofilatto_, Apr 19 2010a(n) = sum(i=1..n-1, A036263(i)), n >= 1. - _Daniel Forgues_, Apr 07 2014
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: a(1) = 0 since 2 is adjacent to 3; a(2) = 1 since 4 is between 3 and 5; a(4) = 3 = 11 - 7 - 1, etc
maple: A046933:=n->ithprime(n+1)-ithprime(n)-1; seq(A046933(n), n=1..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 15 2014
mathematica: Differences[Prime[Range[100]]] - 1 (* _Arkadiusz Wesolowski_, Nov 18 2011 *)Table[Prime[n + 1] - Prime[n] - 1, {n, 100}] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 15 2014 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n)=prime(n+1)-prime(n)-1 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 20 2012(Haskell)a046933 n = a046933_list !! (n-1)a046933_list = map (subtract 1) a001223_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 12 2012
author: _Marc LeBrun_, Dec 11 1999
